#summary The contextmenu attribute specifies an element's context menu.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-whatwg

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [DivElement <div> element] > *contextmenu attribute*

== Usage ==

== Values ==

The value of a `contextmenu` attribute is the ID of a [MenuElement menu] element defined elsewhere in the document.

== Elements ==

You can use the `contextmenu` attribute on any element.
